title: 4C Competency Development through Chemistry Learning: PjBL and STEM-Integrated Simulation Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic chemistry concepts (atomic structure, chemical equations) and VR device usage experience
context.additional_context: Conducted in a BYOD environment, students undertake career-linked projects in medical/technical fields

learning_goals: Designing chemistry experiments for real-life problem-solving while improving critical thinking (CT) by over 80%
Proposing creative solutions (e.g., voltaic cell design) integrating STEM knowledge with over 90% participation
Using VR collaboration tools, learners orally/visually present project results while assessing communication skills (CC)
In small teams (2-3 members), learners strengthen collaboration skills (CL) by exchanging iterative feedback four or more times based on role division
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
